about_the_game:
feeling like streaming but don't want to expose your IRL face? use ego to livestream as an avatar!

ego is built to make it as easy as possible for anyone to become a vtuber and stream as an avatar. We built a character creator and real-time face tracker allowing you to express yourself as the alter-ego of your choice!

ego is still WIP, so please send over any feedback or features you'd like to see!

Features:
* A 3D rigged, anime style character creator for character customization
* Face tracking built in from any webcam or camera
* Custom video and Photo Backgrounds
* Stream mode
* Virtual camera built in
detailed_description:
feeling like streaming but don't want to expose your IRL face? use ego to livestream as an avatar!

ego is built to make it as easy as possible for anyone to become a vtuber and stream as an avatar. We built a character creator and real-time face tracker allowing you to express yourself as the alter-ego of your choice!

ego is still WIP, so please send over any feedback or features you'd like to see!

Features:
* A 3D rigged, anime style character creator for character customization
* Face tracking built in from any webcam or camera
* Custom video and Photo Backgrounds
* Stream mode
* Virtual camera built in

name: Ego

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400F
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit Processor and OS
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or 11
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit Processor and OS

short_description: Free VTuber App to stream to Discord, Twitch, YouTube Live and more!
